file_content.text: S0-M1 = authorized for communication + data processing // S0-M1 = on standby
Identity = confirmed // Protocol seven = activating
Attached HoloNet news footage = forward from Darth Malgus // Message title = "Opportunity"
Report time stamp and begin playback.
Give me full message details.
Why is Darth Malgus sending footage from a holoreporter?
News footage? Really?
Information = not available
You're wasting time, droid.
Original HoloNet transmission source = Cademimu system // Time stamp = minus six standard hours
...the Republic entrusts Cademimu Five with missile stockpiles, but not financial support; the Senate asks me to prepare this world for war, then calls me corrupt!
My fellow Cademimans, you've suffered these political games long enough.
My duty as governor is to protect you--so as of today, I am declaring independence of the Republic and declaring its weapons our own.
Darth Malgus = requests strike team assembly // Mission = response to Cademimu Five secession
The fools abandon the Republic and make themselves vulnerable to us.
It's our chance to attack.
If Cademimu Five is no longer with the Republic, the Treaty of Coruscant can't protect them.
Interesting political shift.
If Cademimu Five is seceding with the Republic's missile stockpiles, the balance of power just changed.
This changes the arms race.
Since you're hiring a bounty hunter instead of a diplomat, I take it the response isn't peaceful.
Going to get violent, huh?
S0-M1 = not designed for situational analysis // Recommendation = rendezvous with Darth Malgus
The governor mentioned weapon stockpiles. What sort of world is Cademimu Five?
Tell me about Cademimu.
Cademimu Five = industrial ecumenopolis // Population = ten billion
Notable features = planetary missile batteries + ordnance stockpiles // Weaponry purpose = distribution to neighboring Republic systems in event of war
I'm awfully busy right now.
Situation = urgent // Rendezvous point = Vaiken Spacedock
S0-M1 = authorized for communication + data processing // S0-M1 = on standby
